videos.headline: Akron blocks punt return for score, takes lead
videos.description: Akron DB Zach Guiser blocks a punt that is scooped up by Ulysees Gilbert and run back 30 yards for the touchdown, giving the Zips the lead over Marshall.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Akron blocks punt return for score, takes lead) 2016/09/17 ESHEET
